original_text: For it is a pleasant thing if thou keep them within thee; they shall withal be fitted in thy lips.
korean_text: 이것을 네 속에 보존하며 네 입술 위에 함께 있게 함이 아름다우니라

sentences.original_text: For it is a pleasant thing
if thou keep them within thee;
they shall withal be fitted in thy lips.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 또한 당신의 입술에 맞게 될 것입니다.
